Text.Page:
We've found traces of {@LinkCreature:16#2304$$sanguine moppets} and {@LinkCreature:16#2303#vampir jesters}, so it's not the vampirs. This is clearly something else.

I need you to find more clues.

This is no good. I mean—no, you did a proper job—but these stones are...demonic. Is that what's going on? Are demons controlling the vampirs?

I have more to work out, but thank you for finding these.
When you bring me more clues, I'll have a better idea what's going on.
